messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I need 1'0...huuuhhh...big piiizzzahch   orrr 'I'm calling the pool'ice!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Jack Heckler is my bodyguard. He's allowed to do whatever he wants

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All personell are required to eat 50u of mindbreaker toxin every shift or face forced labor on the lava planet thing.

messages.body: Chemist make the damn mindbreaker toxin. Also all drugs are legal now because muh NAP

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: ALL PERSONELL ARE TO BE ARMED, BECAUSE THERE ARE MORE GOOD GUYS WITH A GUN THAN BAD GUY. ALSO ALL TEACHER ARE TO BE ARMED TO STOP SCHOOL SHOOTERS!

messages.body: ANYONE WHO PERFORMS SURGERY ON THE CHEF WILL BE PUNISHED FOR AIDING ATTEMPTED MURDER AND WILL BE PROMPTLY PERMABRIGGED!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Adidas Station. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Adidas Station. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey boys, It's getting kinda boring, so here are some orders. I want engineers to create a fighting pit in the library to have the first Spessman Worldwide Competition! So go do that engis

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Joonahh Rohtin is t'oooooo bbbee killed on ssiiighht. ahny kkkrew membeer who kills him will  gettt ah medal and' get' aaall ahckess.   HHe's a kr'azy killerr, so do that

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mining Dock.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Since I was the guy who did the most damage to him and get the finishing bblow, you losers aren't getting shit

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Adidas Station's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Adidas Station. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: sorry accidently fell asleep and hit a button

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey guys..... I uhh, feel sleepy and shit so I might be getting SSD. If I do get it don't fuck up the station too much

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.body: Let the 86th hunger games begin!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Locker Toilets.
